name: BNPL Pay
introduce: BNPL Pay is a decentralized lending protocol that puts credit in the hands of those who need it the most, namely, those who cannot meet the requirements to take on collateralized loans. BNPL Pay tackles the counterparty risk associated with uncollateralized borrowing through a distributed network of Banking Nodes. BNPL Pay's system delegates the tasks of credit checks, risk assessment and other due diligence requirements to pool operators, and creates a set of incentive structures that reward and punish these operators for performing such tasks effectively.
